content: We just pushed @Vishnu Ks's work on making nice user profiles show up when you click the message menu on a message. There's one open bug (#4251) related to this that we need to fix, but otherwise we're not aware of any problems (though there are lots of future features like timezones and custom fields to add)
Click a user's name or the top half of their avatar (top half only = the bug) to check it out
We probably should get the hotkey working also. Pinging @Daw-Ran Liou on status.
This thread is a good place to post feedback. I think one thing that's probably worth doing now is to add slightly rounded corners to the message feed avatars to make them look a bit nicer.
Yeah the hotkey would be pretty nice now that we have this :)

Hmm this looks like a regression probably introduced by the CSS for that popover?

pasted image
This is probably a good opportunity to extract popovers.css since I think we don't have any major in-flight changes to that part of the our CSS right now

A few suggestions:

  • How does it look without the ~1px white border around the profile? It seems like that might work better?
  • What do you think of the actions being:
    ** Send private message
    ** Reply mentioning user
    ** <hr>, to separate the actions from the views
    ** View private messages
    ** View messages sent

(messages sent matches the language we use in the search autocomplete)
